bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.spirit.name: Drone spirituel
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.spirit.description: L'unité de soutien de départ. Apparaît dans la base par défaut. Mine automatiquement les minerais, récupère les objets au sol et répare les blocs.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.phantom.name: Drone Fantôme
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.phantom.description: Une unité de soutien avancée. Mine automatiquement les minerais, récupère les objets au sol et répare les blocs. Bien plus efficace qu'un drone spirituel.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.dagger.name: Poignard
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.dagger.description: Une unité terrestre de base. Utile en essaims.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.crawler.name: Chenille
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.titan.name: Titan
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.titan.description: Une unité terrestre cuirassée avancée. Utilise de l'alliage lourd pour munition. Attaque les unités aérinnes comme terrestres.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.ghoul.name: Bombardier goule
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.ghoul.description: Un bombardier lourd. Utilise de la pyratite ou des explosifs comme munitions.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.wraith.name: Combattant spectral
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.wraith.description: Une unité volante rapide harcelant les ennemis. Utilise du plomb comme munitions.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.fortress.name: Forteresse
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.revenant.name: Revenant
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.eruptor.name: Eruptor
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.chaos-array.name: Chaos Array
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.eradicator.name: Eradicator
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.lich.name: Lich
bundle_fr_BE.properties.unit.reaper.name: Reaper
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.begin: Votre mission, si vous l'acceptez est de détruire [LIGHT_GRAY]l'ennemi[].\n\nCommencez par [accent] miner du cuivre[]. Appuyer sur un filon de cuivre proche de votre base pour faire ceci.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.drill: Le minage manuel est inefficace.\n[accent]Des foreuses[]peuvent miner automatiquement.\nPlacez-en une sur un filon de cuivre.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Les Tapis roulants[] sont utilisés pour transporter des objets jusqu'à la base.\nFaites une ligne de tapis roulants de la foreuse à la base .
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.morecopper: Plus de cuivre est demandé .\n\nRécupérez le soit manuellement soit construisez plus de foreuses.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.turret: Des constructions défensives doivent être construites pour repousser [LIGHT_GRAY]les ennemis[].Construisez une tourelle "duo" près de votre base.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Les tourelles "Duo" ont besoin de [accent]munitions en cuivre[] pour tirer.\nPlacez une foreuse à côté de la tourelle pour l'approvisionner avec du cuivre.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.waves: Les [LIGHT_GRAY]ennemies[] approchent.\n\nDéfendez votre base pour 2 vagues. Construisez plus de tourelles.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.lead: Plus de minerais sont forables. Explorez et minez du[accent] Plomb[].\n\nRamenez votre unité à la base pour transférer les ressources.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.smelter:
Le cuivre et le plomb sont des métaux fragiles.
Un alliage de qualité supérieure peut être créé dans une fonderie, l'[accent] alliage lourd [].

 Construisez-en un.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.densealloy: La fonderie va maintenant produire de l'alliage lourd.\nObtenez-en .\nVous pouvez aussi améliorer la production si nécessaire .
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
La base va maintenant créer un[accent] drone spirituel[] pour miner et réparer les blocs.

Des usines pour faire d'autres unités peuvent être faites avec du [accent] silicone.
Faites une fonderie de silicone .
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: Faire du silicone demande [accent] du charbon[] et[accent] du sable [].\nCommencez par construire des foreuses .
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.generator: Cette technologie requiert de l'énergie pour fonctionner.\nFaites un [accent]générateur à combustion[] pour en produire.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: Les générateurs à combustion ont besoin de carburant.\n Donnez-lui du charbon comme carburant avec une foreuse.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.node: L'énergie doit être transportée .\nCréez un [accent] Transmetteur energétique[] à côté de votre générateur à combustion pour transférer son énergie.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.nodelink: L'énergie peut être transféré à l'aide de blocs utilisant de l'énergie ou des générateurs, ou encore par des Transmetteurs énergétiques reliés.\n\nReliez des transmetteurs en appuyant dessus puis en sélectionnant le générateur et la fonderie de silicone.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.silicon: Du silicone est maintenant produit. Obtenez-en.\n\nAugmenter la production est recommandé.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: Construire [accent]une usine de "Poignards" []est recommandé .\n\nElle sera utilisée pour produire des unités d'attaque.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.router: Les usines ont besoin de ressources pour fonctionner.\nCréez un routeur pour séparer les objets.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.dagger: Reliez des transmetteurs énergétiques à l'usine.\nUne fois que les conditions seront remplies , un mécha sera créé.\nConstruisez autant de foreuses, de générateurs et de tapis roulants que nécessaire.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.tutorial.battle: [LIGHT_GRAY]L'Ennemi[] a révélé sa base.\nDétruisez la avec votre unité et des méchas "Poignard".
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.copper-wall.description: Un bloc défensif bon marché.\nUtile pour protéger le noyau et les tourelles lors des premières vagues.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: Un bloc défensif bon marché.\nUtile pour protéger le noyau et les tourelles lors des premières vagues.\nS'étend sur plusieurs tuiles.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: Un puissant bloc défensif.\nBonne protection contre les ennemis.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: Un puissant bloc défensif.\nBonne protection contre les ennemis.\nS'étend sur plusieurs tuiles.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Pas aussi fort qu'un mur de thorium, mais détournera les balles à moins qu'elles ne soient trop puissantes.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Pas aussi fort qu'un mur de thorium, mais détournera les balles à moins qu'elles ne soient trop puissantes.\nS'étend sur plusieurs tuiles.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.surge-wall.description: Le bloc défensif le plus puissant.\nPeu de chances de déclencher des éclairs en direction de l'attaquant.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: Le bloc défensif le plus puissant.\nPeu de chances de déclencher des éclairs en direction de l'attaquant.\nS'étend sur plusieurs tuiles.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.door.description: Une petite porte qui peut être ouverte et fermée en tapotant dessus.\nSi elle est ouverte, les ennemis peuvent tirer et se déplacer.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.door-large.description: Une grande porte qui peut être ouverte et fermée en tapotant dessus.\nSi elle est ouverte, les ennemis peuvent tirer et se déplacer.\nS'étend sur plusieurs tuiles.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Guérit périodiquement les bâtiments situés à proximité.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Augmente la vitesse des bâtiments à proximité, comme les foreuses et les convoyeurs.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.force-projector.description: Crée un champ de force hexagonal autour de lui-même, protégeant les bâtiments et les unités internes des dommages causés par les balles.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Endommage les ennemis qui marchent sur la mine. Presque invisible à l'ennemi.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.scatter.description: Une tourelle anti-air de taille moyenne. Pulvérise des amas de plomb ou de ferraille sur les unités ennemies.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.arc.description: Une petite tourelle qui tire de l'électricité dans un arc au hasard vers l'ennemi.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.lancer.description: Une tourelle de taille moyenne qui tire des faisceaux d’électricité chargés.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.wave.description: Une tourelle de taille moyenne à tir rapide qui tire des bulles de liquide.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.salvo.description: Une tourelle de taille moyenne qui tire des coups de salves.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.swarmer.description: Une tourelle de taille moyenne qui tire des missiles éclatés.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.ripple.description: Une grande tourelle d'artillerie qui tire plusieurs coups simultanément.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.cyclone.description: Une grande tourelle à tir rapide.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.fuse.description: Une grande tourelle qui tire de puissants faisceaux à courte portée.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.spectre.description: Une grande tourelle qui tire deux balles puissantes à la fois.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.meltdown.description: Une grande tourelle qui tire de puissants faisceaux à longue portée.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.conveyor.description: Bloc de transport d'articles standard.\nDéplace les objets et les déposes automatiquement dans des tourelles ou des usines. Rotatif.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Bloc de transport d'articles avancé.\nDéplace les articles plus rapidement que les convoyeurs standard.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Bloc de transport d'articles avancé.\nUtilise le pouvoir de téléporter des articles vers un convoyeur de phase connecté sur plusieurs carreaux.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.junction.description: Agit comme un pont pour deux bandes transporteuses qui se croisent.\nUtile dans les situations avec deux convoyeurs différents transportant des matériaux différents à des endroits différents.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Bloc de transport d'articles ultime.\nRecueille plusieurs objets et les envoie ensuite à un autre pilote de masse sur une longue distance.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Réduit le sable avec du coke* très pur afin de produire du silicium. (*Coke produit à partir de charbon:REF)
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produit du plastanium à partir de pétrole et de titane.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produit un tissu de phase à partir de thorium radioactif et de grandes quantités de sable.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produit un alliage de surtension à partir de titane, plomb, silicium et cuivre.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Brise la pierre en sable. Utile en cas de manque de sable naturel.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mélange le charbon, le plomb et le sable en pyratite hautement inflammable.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Utilise du pétrole pour transformer la pyratite en un composé explosif moins inflammable mais plus explosif.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: L'eau et le titane combinés forment un fluide cryo beaucoup plus efficace pour le refroidissement.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.melter.description: Chauffe la pierre à des températures très élevées pour obtenir de la lave.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.incinerator.description: Se débarrasse de tout article ou liquide en excès.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.spore-press.description: Comprime les gousses de spores en huile.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.separator.description: Exposer la pierre à la pression de l'eau afin d'obtenir différents minéraux contenus dans la pierre.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmet la puissance à des noeuds connectés. Il est possible de connecter jusqu'à quatre sources d'alimentation, puits ou nœuds.\nLe nœud recevra de l’alimentation ou fournira l’alimentation à tous les blocs adjacents.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Son rayon d'action est supérieur à celui du nœud d'alimentation et peut être connecté à six sources d'alimentation, puits ou nœuds au maximum.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.battery.description: Stocke l’énergie chaque fois qu’il ya abondance et en cas de pénurie, tant qu’il reste de la capacité.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stocke beaucoup plus d'énergie qu'une batterie ordinaire.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Génère de l'énergie en brûlant du pétrole ou des matériaux inflammables.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: Plus efficace qu'un générateur de combustion, mais nécessite de l'eau supplémentaire.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Génère une grande quantité d'énergie grâce à la lave.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Fournit une petite quantité d'énergie grâce au soleil.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Fournit une bien meilleure alimentation qu'un panneau solaire standard, mais coûte également beaucoup plus cher à construire.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Génère d'énormes quantités d'énergie à partir de thorium hautement radioactif. Nécessite un refroidissement constant.\nExplose violemment si des quantités insuffisantes de liquide de refroidissement ne sont pas fournies.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: Générateur thermoélectrique à radio-isotopes ne nécessitant pas de refroidissement mais fournissant moins d'énergie qu'un réacteur à thorium.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.unloader.description: Décharge des articles d'un conteneur, d'une chambre forte ou d'un noyau sur un convoyeur ou directement dans un bloc adjacent.\nLe type d'élément à décharger peut être modifié en tapotant sur le déchargeur.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.container.description: Stocke une petite quantité d'objets. Utilisez-le pour créer des tampons lorsqu'il existe une demande non constante de matériaux. [LIGHT_GRAY]Un déchargeur[] peut être utilisé pour récupérer des éléments du conteneur.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.vault.description: Stocke une grande quantité d'objets. Utilisez-le pour créer des tampons lorsqu'il existe une demande non constante de matériaux. [LIGHT_GRAY]Un déchargeur[] peut être utilisé pour récupérer des éléments du coffre-fort.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: Un extracteur bon marché. Lorsqu'il est placé sur des carreaux appropriés, les objets sortent à un rythme lent et indéfiniment.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: Un extracteur améliorée, plus rapide et capable de traiter des matériaux plus durs en utilisant la pression atmosphérique.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Permet de forer encore plus rapidement grâce à la technologie laser, mais nécessite de l'énergie. De plus, le thorium radioactif peut être récupéré avec cet extracteur.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.blast-drill.description: L'extracteur ultime. Nécessite de grandes quantités d'énergie.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extrait l'eau du sol. Utilisez-le quand il n'y a pas de lac à proximité.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultiver le sol avec de l'eau afin d'obtenir du biomatter.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Utilise de grandes quantités d'énergie pour extraire le pétrole du sable. Utilisez-le lorsqu'il n'y a pas de source directe de pétrole à proximité.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Quittez votre vaisseau actuel et changez-vous en un bombardier lourd raisonnablement bien blindé.\nUtilisez la plate-forme en tapotant deux fois dessus.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Quittez votre vaisseau actuel et changez-vous en un intercepteur puissant et rapide doté d’armes légères.\nUtilisez la plate-forme en tapotant deux fois dessus.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Quittez votre vaisseau actuel et changez-vous en un grand vaisseau de combat bien blindé.\nUtilisez la plate-forme en tapotant deux fois dessus.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Quittez votre vaisseau actuel et changez-vous en un centre de support capable de soigner les bâtiments et unités amis.\nUtilisez la plate-forme en tapotant deux fois dessus.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Quittez votre vaisseau actuel et changez-vous en un méchant rapide, légèrement blindé, conçu pour les attaques à la volée.\nUtilisez la plate-forme en tapotant deux fois dessus.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Quittez votre vaisseau actuel et changez-vous en un mech encombrant et bien blindé, conçu pour les assauts de première ligne.\nUtilisez la plate-forme en tapotant deux fois dessus.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produit des drones légers qui extraient du minerai et réparent des blocs.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produit des unités de drones avancées qui sont nettement plus efficaces qu'un drone spirituel.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.wraith-factory.description: Produit des intercepteurs rapides qui harcèlent l'ennemi.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.ghoul-factory.description: Produit des tapis de bombardiers lourds.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.dagger-factory.description: Produit des unités terrestres de base.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.titan-factory.description: Produit des unités terrestres avancées et blindées.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.fortress-factory.description: Produit des unités terrestres d'artillerie lourde.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.revenant-factory.description: Produit des unités terrestres laser lourdes.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.repair-point.description: Soigne en permanence l'unité endommagée la plus proche à proximité.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.conduit.description: Bloc de transport liquide de base. Fonctionne comme un convoyeur, mais avec des liquides. Utilisation optimale avec des extracteurs, des pompes ou d’autres conduits.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Bloc de transport de liquide avancé. Transporte les liquides plus rapidement et stocke plus que des conduits standard.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Bloc de transport de liquide avancé. Utilise le pouvoir de téléporter des liquides vers un conduit de phase connecté sur plusieurs carreaux.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepte les liquides d'une direction et les envoie dans 3 autres directions de manière égale. Peut également stocker une certaine quantité de liquide. Utile pour séparer les liquides d'une source à plusieurs cibles.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stocke une grande quantité de liquides. Utilisez-le pour créer des tampons en cas de demande non constante de matériaux ou comme protection pour le refroidissement des blocs vitaux.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Agit comme un pont pour deux conduits de croisement. Utile dans les situations avec deux conduits différents transportant des liquides différents à des endroits différents.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Bloc de transport de liquide avancé. Permet de transporter des liquides jusqu'à 3 tuiles de n'importe quel terrain ou bâtiment.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: Une pompe bon marché avec un débit lent, mais aucune consommation d'énergie.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: Une pompe avancée qui double la vitesse en utilisant l’énergie.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: La pompe ultime. Trois fois plus rapide qu'une pompe mécanique et la seule pompe capable de récupérer de la lave.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.router.description: Accepte les éléments d'une direction et les envoie dans 3 autres directions de manière égale. Utile pour séparer les matériaux d'une source en plusieurs cibles.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.distributor.description: Un routeur avancé qui divise les articles en 7 autres directions de manière égale. [scarlet]Seule et unique ![]
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Bloc de transport d'articles avancé. Permet de transporter des objets sur plus de 3 tuiles de n'importe quel terrain ou bâtiment.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.item-source.description: Sort infiniment les articles. Bac à sable seulement.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.liquid-source.description: Débit infini de liquides. Bac à sable seulement.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.item-void.description: Détruit tous les objets qui y entrent sans utiliser d'énergie. Bac à sable seulement.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.power-source.description: Débit infini d'énergie. Bac à sable seulement.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.block.power-void.description: Annule toute l'énergie qui y est introduite. Bac à sable seulement.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.liquid.water.description: Couramment utilisé pour les machines de refroidissement et le traitement des déchets.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.liquid.oil.description: Peut être brûlé, explosé ou utilisé comme liquide de refroidissement.
bundle_fr_BE.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: Le liquide de refroidissement le plus efficace.

bundle_in_ID.properties.host.info:
Tombol [accent]host[] akan membuat server dengan port [scarlet]6567[] dan [scarlet]6568.[]
Siapa saja yang terhubung ke [LIGHT_GRAY]WiFi atau jaringan lokal[] dapat melihat server Anda di daftar server.

Jika Anda ingin orang-orang agar dapat terhubung dari mana saja melalui IP, diperlukan [accent]port forwarding[].

[LIGHT_GRAY]Catatan: Jika seseorang mengalami kesulitan untuk bergabung, pastikan bahwa Anda telah mengizinkan akses Mindustry ke jaringan lokal Anda di pengaturan firewall.
bundle_in_ID.properties.join.info:
Di sini, Anda dapat memasukan [accent]IP server[] yang akan dihubungkan, atau menemukan server di [accent]jaringan lokal[] untuk dihubungkan.
Kedua jaringan LAN dan WAN didukung.

[LIGHT_GRAY]Catatan: There is no automatic global server list; if you want to connect to someone by IP, you would need to ask the host for their IP.

bundle_in_ID.properties.item.copper.name: Copper
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.copper.description: A useful structure material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.lead.name: Lead
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.lead.description: A basic starter material. Used extensively in electronics and liquid transportation blocks.
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.coal.name: batu bara
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.coal.description: A common and readily available fuel.
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.graphite.name: Graphite
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.titanium.name: titanium
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.thorium.name: thorium
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.silicon.name: Silicon
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor, with applications in solar panels and many complex electronics.
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.plastanium.name: Plastanium
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.phase-fabric.name: Phase Fabric
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.surge-alloy.name: Surge Alloy
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.spore-pod.name: Spore Pod
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.sand.name: pasir
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.blast-compound.name: Blast Compound
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.blast-compound.description: A volatile compound used in bombs and explosives. While it can burned as fuel, this is not advised.
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.pyratite.name: Pyratite
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.metaglass.name: Metaglass
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.scrap.name: Scrap
bundle_in_ID.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_in_ID.properties.liquid.water.name: air
bundle_in_ID.properties.liquid.slag.name: Slag
bundle_in_ID.properties.liquid.oil.name: minyak
bundle_in_ID.properties.liquid.cryofluid.name: Cryofluid
bundle_in_ID.properties.mech.alpha-mech.name: Alpha
bundle_in_ID.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: The standard mech. Has decent speed and damage output; can create up to 3 drones for increased offensive capability.
bundle_in_ID.properties.mech.delta-mech.name: Delta
bundle_in_ID.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: A fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks. Does little damage against structures, but can kill large groups of enemy units very quickly with its arc lightning weapons.
bundle_in_ID.properties.mech.tau-mech.name: Tau
bundle_in_ID.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: The support mech. Heals allied blocks by shooting at them. Can extinguish fires and heal allies in a radius with its repair ability.
bundle_in_ID.properties.mech.omega-mech.name: Omega
bundle_in_ID.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: A bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults. Its armor ability can block up to 90% of incoming damage.
bundle_in_ID.properties.mech.dart-ship.name: Dart
bundle_in_ID.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: The standard ship. Reasonably fast and light, but has little offensive capability and low mining speed.
bundle_in_ID.properties.mech.javelin-ship.name: Javelin
bundle_in_ID.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: A hit-and-run strike ship. While initially slow, it can accelerate to great speeds and fly by enemy outposts, dealing large amounts of damage with its lightning ability and missiles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.mech.trident-ship.name: Trident
bundle_in_ID.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: A heavy bomber. Reasonably well armored.
bundle_in_ID.properties.mech.glaive-ship.name: Glaive
bundle_in_ID.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: A large, well-armored gunship. Equipped with an incendiary repeater. Good acceleration and maximum speed.

bundle_in_ID.properties.unit.spirit.description: The starter drone unit. Spawns in the core by default. Automatically mines ores, collects items and repairs blocks.
bundle_in_ID.properties.unit.phantom.name: Phantom Drone
bundle_in_ID.properties.unit.phantom.description: An advanced drone unit. Automatically mines ores, collects items and repairs blocks. Significantly more effective than a drone.
bundle_in_ID.properties.unit.dagger.name: Dagger
bundle_in_ID.properties.unit.dagger.description: A basic ground unit. Useful in swarms.
bundle_in_ID.properties.unit.crawler.name: Crawler
bundle_in_ID.properties.unit.titan.name: Titan
bundle_in_ID.properties.unit.titan.description: An advanced armored ground unit. Uses carbide as ammo. Attacks both ground and air targets.
bundle_in_ID.properties.unit.ghoul.name: Ghoul Bomber
bundle_in_ID.properties.unit.ghoul.description: A heavy carpet bomber. Uses blast compound or pyratite as ammo.

bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.begin: Your mission here is to eradicate the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\n\nBegin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.drill: Mining manually is inefficient.\n[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.\nPlace one on a copper vein.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.\nMake a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.morecopper: More copper is required.\n\nEither mine it manually, or place more drills.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\nBuild a duo turret near your base.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.\nPlace a drill next to the turret to supply it with mined copper.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.waves: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] approaches.\n\nDefend your core for 2 waves. Build more turrets.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.lead: More ores are available. Explore and mine[accent] lead[].\n\nDrag from your unit to the core to transfer resources.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.smelter:
Copper and lead are weak metals.
Superior[accent] Dense Alloy[] can be created in a smelter.

Build one.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.densealloy: The smelter will now produce alloy.\nGet some.\nImprove the production if necessary.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
The core will now create a[accent] spirit drone[] for mining and repairing blocks.

Factories for other units can be created with [accent] silicon.
Make a silicon smelter.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: Silicon requires[accent] coal[] and[accent] sand[].\nStart by making drills.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.generator: This technology requires power.\nCreate a[accent] combustion generator[] for it.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: Combustion generators need fuel.\nFuel it with coal from a drill.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.node: Power requires transport.\nCreate a[accent] power node[] next to your combustion generator to transfer its power.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.nodelink: Power can be transferred through contacting power blocks and generators, or by linked power nodes.\n\nLink power by tapping the node and selecting the generator and silicon smelter.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.silicon: Silicon is being produced. Get some.\n\nImproving the production system is advised.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: Construct a[accent] dagger mech factory.[]\n\nThis will be used to create attack mechs.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.router: Factories need resources to function.\nCreate a router to split conveyor resources.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.dagger:
Link power nodes to the factory.
Once requirements are met, a mech will be created.

Create more drills, generators and conveyors as necessary.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.battle: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] has revealed their core.\nDestroy it with your unit and dagger mechs.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals buildings in its vicinity.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.arc.description: A small turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moved items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coke in order to produce silicon.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes stone into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.melter.description: Heats up stone to very high temperatures to obtain lava.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.separator.description: Exposes stone to water pressure in order to obtain various minerals contained in the stone.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates a large amount of power from lava.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates the soil with water in order to obtain biomatter.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: The ultimate pump. Three times as fast as a mechanical pump and the only pump which is able to retrieve lava.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_in_ID.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_in_ID.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_in_ID.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.

bundle_it.properties.credits.text:
Creato da [ROYAL]Anuken[] - [SKY]anukendev@gmail.com[]

[GRAY](Nel caso non te ne sia accorto, la traduzione del gioco non è completa.
 Chi di dovere sta lavorando più velocemente possibile per completarla! Un aiutino non sarebbe male!)
bundle_it.properties.discord: Unisciti sul server discord di mindustry!
bundle_it.properties.link.discord.description: la chatroom ufficiale del server discord di Mindustry
bundle_it.properties.link.trello.description: Scheda ufficiale trello per funzionalità pianificate
bundle_it.properties.link.itch.io.description: pagina di itch.io con download per PC e versione web
bundle_it.properties.linkfail: Impossibile aprire il link! L'URL è stato copiato nella tua bacheca.
bundle_it.properties.screenshot.invalid: Mappa troppo grossa, probabilmente non c'è abbastanza memoria libera.
bundle_it.properties.placeline: Hai appena selezionato un blocco.\nOra puoi[accent] piazzarne una linea[] eseguendo[accent] una lunga pressione[] e poi trascinando in ogni direzione.\nProva!
bundle_it.properties.removearea: Hai appena selezionato la modalità distruzione.\nOra puoi[accent] rimuovere blocchi in una certa zona [] eseguendo[accent] una lunga pressione[] e poi trascinando in ogni direzione.\nProva!
bundle_it.properties.map.delete: Sei sicuro di voler eliminare questa mappa"[accent]{0}[]"?
bundle_it.properties.name: Nome:
bundle_it.properties.noname: Scegli un [accent] nome[] prima di unirti.
bundle_it.properties.server.kicked.clientOutdated: Versione del client obsoleta! Aggiorna il tuo gioco!
bundle_it.properties.server.kicked.serverOutdated: Server obsoleto! Chiedi all'host di aggiornare!
bundle_it.properties.server.kicked.recentKick: Sei stato cacciato di recente.\nAspetta prima di riconnetterti.
bundle_it.properties.server.kicked.nameInUse: C'è già qualcuno con il tuo nome\nsu questo server.
bundle_it.properties.server.kicked.nameEmpty: Il tuo nome deve contenere almeno un carattere.
bundle_it.properties.server.kicked.idInUse: Sei già su questo server! Non è permesso connettersi con due account.
bundle_it.properties.server.kicked.customClient: Questo server non supporta le build personalizzate. Scarica la versione ufficiale dal sito.
bundle_it.properties.host.info:
Il pulsante [accent]hos [] ospita un server sulle porte [scarlet]6567[] e [scarlet]656.[] Chiunque sulla stessa [LIGHT_GRAY]connessione wifi o rete locale[] dovrebbe essere in grado di vedere il proprio server nel proprio elenco server.

 Se vuoi che le persone siano in grado di connettersi ovunque tramite IP, è richiesto il [accent]port forwarding[]. 

[LIGHT_GRAY]Nota: se qualcuno sta riscontrando problemi durante la connessione al gioco LAN, assicurati di aver consentito a Mindustry di accedere alla rete locale nelle impostazioni del firewall.
bundle_it.properties.join.info:
Qui è possibile inserire un [accent]IP del server[] a cui connettersi, o scoprire [accento]un server sulla rete locale[] disponibile.
 Sono supportati sia il multiplayer LAN che WAN. 

[LIGHT_GRAY]Nota: non esiste un elenco di server globali automatici; se si desidera connettersi a qualcuno tramite IP, è necessario chiedere all'host il proprio IP.
bundle_it.properties.invalidid: ID client non valido! Invia una segnalazione di bug.

bundle_it.properties.item.copper.name: Rame
bundle_it.properties.item.copper.description: Una utile materiale styrutturale. Molto usato in tutti i blocchi.
bundle_it.properties.item.lead.name: Piombo
bundle_it.properties.item.lead.description: Un materiale base, molto usato nei blocchi di trasporto.
bundle_it.properties.item.coal.name: carbone
bundle_it.properties.item.coal.description: Un carburante comune e facilmente ottenibile.
bundle_it.properties.item.graphite.name: Graphite
bundle_it.properties.item.titanium.name: titanio
bundle_it.properties.item.titanium.description: Un raro metallo super leggero usato ampiamente nel trasporto di liquidi, trapani e navi.
bundle_it.properties.item.thorium.name: Torio
bundle_it.properties.item.thorium.description: Un materiale denso e radioattivo, utilizzato nella costruzione di strutture e come carburante del reattore nucleare.
bundle_it.properties.item.silicon.name: Silicio
bundle_it.properties.item.silicon.description: Un semiconduttore molto utile che viene utilizzato nei pannelli solari e nei macchinari elettronici.
bundle_it.properties.item.plastanium.name: Plastaniu
bundle_it.properties.item.plastanium.description: Un materiale leggero e duttile, utilizzato nelle navi avanzete e come munizione.
bundle_it.properties.item.phase-fabric.name: Phase Fabric
bundle_it.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_it.properties.item.surge-alloy.name: Surge Alloy
bundle_it.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_it.properties.item.spore-pod.name: Spore Pod
bundle_it.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_it.properties.item.sand.name: sabbia
bundle_it.properties.item.sand.description: Un materiale base che viene altamente usato nei processi di fusione, Sia come lega che come lubrificante.
bundle_it.properties.item.blast-compound.name: Polvere esplosiva
bundle_it.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Un composto altamente volatile, utilizzato nella produzione di bombe ed esplosivi. Può essere utilizzato come combustibile anche se non è consigliato.
bundle_it.properties.item.pyratite.name: Pirite
bundle_it.properties.item.pyratite.description: Una sostanza molto infiammabile che viene utilizzata nelle armi a fuoco.
bundle_it.properties.item.metaglass.name: Metaglass
bundle_it.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_it.properties.item.scrap.name: Scrap
bundle_it.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.water.name: acqua
bundle_it.properties.liquid.slag.name: Slag
bundle_it.properties.liquid.oil.name: petrolio
bundle_it.properties.liquid.cryofluid.name: criogenium
bundle_it.properties.mech.alpha-mech.name: Alpha
bundle_it.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: Il mech standard. È abbastanza veloce e produce abbastanza danni; può anche generare 3 droni per aumentare il suo danno complessivo.
bundle_it.properties.mech.delta-mech.name: Delta
bundle_it.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: Un veloce, poco armato mech fatto per giocare a tocca e fuga con il nemico. Fa poco danno alle strutture, ma può uccidere un gran nummero di nemici grazie alle sue armi ad alto voltaggio.
bundle_it.properties.mech.tau-mech.name: Tau
bundle_it.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: Un mach di supporto. Cura i blocchi danneggiati sparandogli contro. Può spegnere fuochi e curare i compagni di squadra.
bundle_it.properties.mech.omega-mech.name: Omega
bundle_it.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: Un ingombrante e ben armato mech, fatto per stare in prima linea. La sue difese possono bloccare fino al 90% dei danni.
bundle_it.properties.mech.dart-ship.name: Dart
bundle_it.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: Una navicella standard. Molto veloce e leggera, ma può minare pochi blocchi e ha scarse potenzialità nella difesa.
bundle_it.properties.mech.javelin-ship.name: Javelin
bundle_it.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: Una navetta da tocca e fuga. Anche se inizialmente lenta, può accellerare ad alte velocità e voloare sopra gli avamposti dei nemici, può provocare molti danni ai nemici tramite l'utilizzo di fulmini o missili.
bundle_it.properties.mech.trident-ship.name: Tridente
bundle_it.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: Un bombardiere pesante. Giùstamente ben protetto.
bundle_it.properties.mech.glaive-ship.name: Glaive
bundle_it.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: Una grande e ben armata macchina da guerra. Equipaggiato con ripetitore di fiamma e con alta accellerazione e velocità massima.

bundle_it.properties.unit.spirit.description: The starter drone unit. Spawns in the core by default. Automatically mines ores, collects items and repairs blocks.
bundle_it.properties.unit.phantom.name: Phantom Drone
bundle_it.properties.unit.phantom.description: An advanced drone unit. Automatically mines ores, collects items and repairs blocks. Significantly more effective than a drone.
bundle_it.properties.unit.dagger.name: Pericolo
bundle_it.properties.unit.dagger.description: Un unità terrena base, molto più efficiente se in branco.

bundle_it.properties.unit.titan.name: Titano
bundle_it.properties.unit.titan.description: Un'unità di terra corazzata avanzata. Utilizza carburo come munizione. Attacca sia bersagli terrestri che aerei.
bundle_it.properties.unit.ghoul.name: Ghoul Bomber
bundle_it.properties.unit.ghoul.description: A heavy carpet bomber. Uses blast compound or pyratite as ammo.

bundle_it.properties.tutorial.begin: Your mission here is to eradicate the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\n\nBegin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.drill: Mining manually is inefficient.\n[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.\nPlace one on a copper vein.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.\nMake a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.morecopper: More copper is required.\n\nEither mine it manually, or place more drills.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\nBuild a duo turret near your base.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.\nPlace a drill next to the turret to supply it with mined copper.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.waves: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] approaches.\n\nDefend your core for 2 waves. Build more turrets.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.lead: More ores are available. Explore and mine[accent] lead[].\n\nDrag from your unit to the core to transfer resources.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.smelter:
Copper and lead are weak metals.
Superior[accent] Dense Alloy[] can be created in a smelter.

Build one.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.densealloy: The smelter will now produce alloy.\nGet some.\nImprove the production if necessary.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
The core will now create a[accent] spirit drone[] for mining and repairing blocks.

Factories for other units can be created with [accent] silicon.
Make a silicon smelter.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: Silicon requires[accent] coal[] and[accent] sand[].\nStart by making drills.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.generator: This technology requires power.\nCreate a[accent] combustion generator[] for it.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: Combustion generators need fuel.\nFuel it with coal from a drill.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.node: Power requires transport.\nCreate a[accent] power node[] next to your combustion generator to transfer its power.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.nodelink: Power can be transferred through contacting power blocks and generators, or by linked power nodes.\n\nLink power by tapping the node and selecting the generator and silicon smelter.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.silicon: Silicon is being produced. Get some.\n\nImproving the production system is advised.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: Construct a[accent] dagger mech factory.[]\n\nThis will be used to create attack mechs.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.router: Factories need resources to function.\nCreate a router to split conveyor resources.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.dagger:
Link power nodes to the factory.
Once requirements are met, a mech will be created.

Create more drills, generators and conveyors as necessary.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.battle: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] has revealed their core.\nDestroy it with your unit and dagger mechs.
bundle_it.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_it.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_it.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_it.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_it.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals buildings in its vicinity.
bundle_it.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_it.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_it.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_it.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_it.properties.block.arc.description: A small turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_it.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_it.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_it.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_it.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_it.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_it.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_it.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_it.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moved items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_it.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_it.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_it.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coke in order to produce silicon.
bundle_it.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_it.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_it.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes stone into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_it.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_it.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_it.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_it.properties.block.melter.description: Heats up stone to very high temperatures to obtain lava.
bundle_it.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_it.properties.block.separator.description: Exposes stone to water pressure in order to obtain various minerals contained in the stone.
bundle_it.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_it.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_it.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_it.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_it.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_it.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_it.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates a large amount of power from lava.
bundle_it.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_it.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_it.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied.
bundle_it.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_it.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_it.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_it.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_it.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_it.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_it.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_it.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_it.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_it.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates the soil with water in order to obtain biomatter.
bundle_it.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_it.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_it.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_it.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_it.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_it.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_it.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_it.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_it.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_it.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_it.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_it.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: The ultimate pump. Three times as fast as a mechanical pump and the only pump which is able to retrieve lava.
bundle_it.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_it.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_it.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_it.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_it.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.

bundle_ja.properties.host.info:
[accent]ホスト[]ボタンを押すと、ポート[scarlet]6567[]でサーバーが開かれます。同じ[LIGHT_GRAY]Wifi や ローカルネットワーク[]からはサーバーリストで見ることができます。

IPアドレスからどこからでもアクセスできるようにするには、[accent]ポート開放[]する必要があります。

[LIGHT_GRAY]注意:: LAN上のゲームで接続できない場合、Mindustryがファイアウォールの設定でローカルネットワークに接続が許可されているか確認してください。
bundle_ja.properties.join.info:
ここでは、[accent]サーバーのIPアドレス[]から接続したり、[accent]ローカルネットワーク[]のサーバーを探すことができます。
LANとWANの両方のマルチプレイに対応しています。

[LIGHT_GRAY]注意:グローバルサーバーリストはありません。誰かのサーバーにIPで接続したい場合、ホストにIPをお尋ねください。

bundle_ja.properties.item.copper.name: 銅
bundle_ja.properties.item.copper.description: 便利な鉱石です。様々なブロックの材料として幅広く使われています。
bundle_ja.properties.item.lead.name: 鉛
bundle_ja.properties.item.lead.description: 一般的で手軽な鉱石です。機械や液体輸送ブロックなどに使われます。
bundle_ja.properties.item.coal.name: 石炭
bundle_ja.properties.item.coal.description: 一般的で有用な燃料です。
bundle_ja.properties.item.graphite.name: 黒鉛
bundle_ja.properties.item.titanium.name: チタン
bundle_ja.properties.item.titanium.description: 希少で非常に軽量な金属です。液体輸送やドリル、航空機などで使われます。
bundle_ja.properties.item.thorium.name: トリウム
bundle_ja.properties.item.thorium.description: 放射性を持つ高密度な金属です。建物の補強や核燃料として使われます。
bundle_ja.properties.item.silicon.name: シリコン
bundle_ja.properties.item.silicon.description: 非常に有用な半導体でソーラーパネルや多くの複雑な機械に応用できます。
bundle_ja.properties.item.plastanium.name: プラスタニウム
bundle_ja.properties.item.plastanium.description: 軽量で伸縮性のある材料です。機体や弾薬に使用されます。
bundle_ja.properties.item.phase-fabric.name: フェーズファイバー
bundle_ja.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: 極めて軽量な素材です。高度な機械や自己修復技術に使用されます。
bundle_ja.properties.item.surge-alloy.name: サージ合金
bundle_ja.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: 電気的特性を持った特殊な合金です。
bundle_ja.properties.item.spore-pod.name: 胞子ポッド
bundle_ja.properties.item.spore-pod.description: 石油や爆薬、燃料への転換に使用されます。
bundle_ja.properties.item.sand.name: 砂
bundle_ja.properties.item.sand.description: 合金や融剤など広く使用されている一般的な材料です。
bundle_ja.properties.item.blast-compound.name: 爆発性化合物
bundle_ja.properties.item.blast-compound.description: 爆弾や爆発物に使われる揮発性の化合物です。燃料として燃やすこともできますが、お勧めしません。
bundle_ja.properties.item.pyratite.name: ピラタイト
bundle_ja.properties.item.pyratite.description: 兵器などに使われる非常に燃えやすい物質です。
bundle_ja.properties.item.metaglass.name: メタガラス
bundle_ja.properties.item.metaglass.description: とても頑丈な強化ガラスです。液体の輸送やタンクとして幅広く使われています。
bundle_ja.properties.item.scrap.name: スクラップ
bundle_ja.properties.item.scrap.description: 昔の建造物やユニットの残骸です。様々な種類の金属が微量に含まれています。
bundle_ja.properties.liquid.water.name: 水
bundle_ja.properties.liquid.slag.name: スラグ
bundle_ja.properties.liquid.oil.name: 石油
bundle_ja.properties.liquid.cryofluid.name: 冷却水
bundle_ja.properties.mech.alpha-mech.name: アルファ
bundle_ja.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: 一般的な機体です。標準的な速度と攻撃力を持っています。攻撃力を高めるために最大3体のドローン機を持っています。
bundle_ja.properties.mech.delta-mech.name: デルタ
bundle_ja.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: 高速移動する敵のために素早く軽量化された機体です。建物にはほとんどダメージを与えられませんが、電撃でたくさんの敵を攻撃することができます。
bundle_ja.properties.mech.tau-mech.name: タウ
bundle_ja.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: 支援型機体です。ダメージを受けたブロックを修復や火災の消火、半径内の味方の治療を行います。
bundle_ja.properties.mech.omega-mech.name: オメガ
bundle_ja.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: 最前線での攻撃向けに作られた大型機体です。プロテクターによってダメージの90%を防ぐことができます。
bundle_ja.properties.mech.dart-ship.name: ダーツ
bundle_ja.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: 一般的な機体です。軽く高速で使いやすいですが、攻撃能力はほとんどなく採掘速度も遅いのが難点です。
bundle_ja.properties.mech.javelin-ship.name: ジャベリン
bundle_ja.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: 高速移動ができる機体です。最初は遅いですが、敵の基地で飛行能力が飛躍的に高まり、電撃やミサイルで多量のダメージを与えることができます。
bundle_ja.properties.mech.trident-ship.name: トライデント
bundle_ja.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: 強力な爆撃機です。強固な装甲を有しています。
bundle_ja.properties.mech.glaive-ship.name: グライブ
bundle_ja.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: 重武装された大型攻撃機です。焼夷弾が装備され、機体の中でも優れた加速と最高速度を有しています。

bundle_ja.properties.unit.dagger.name: ダガー

bundle_ja.properties.unit.crawler.name: クローラー
bundle_ja.properties.unit.titan.name: タイタン
bundle_ja.properties.unit.titan.description: 改良された武装地上ユニットです。地上と航空機の両方に攻撃します。
bundle_ja.properties.unit.ghoul.name: グール爆撃機
bundle_ja.properties.unit.wraith.name: レースファイター
bundle_ja.properties.unit.wraith.description: 高速で突撃攻撃が可能な迎撃ユニットです。
bundle_ja.properties.unit.fortress.name: フォートレス
