bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.begin: ここでのミッションは[LIGHT_GRAY]敵[]を倒すことです。\n\nまずは、[accent]銅の採掘[]から始めましょう。コアの近くの銅鉱石の鉱脈をタップしましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.drill: 手動で採掘するのは非効率的です。\n[accent]ドリル[]を使えば自動で採掘できます。\n銅鉱石の鉱脈の上に1つ置いてみましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]コンベアー[]はコアにアイテムを輸送することができます。\nドリルからコアまでコンベアー作りましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.morecopper: まだまだ銅が必要です。\n\n手動で採掘するか、ドリルをもっと設置しましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.turret: [LIGHT_GRAY]敵[]を撃退するために防衛体制を作らなければなりません。\n基地の近くにターレットのデュオを設置しましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.drillturret: デュオには弾として[accent]銅の弾薬[]が必要です。\nデュオの横にドリルを置き、採掘した銅を供給しましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.waves: [LIGHT_GRAY]敵[]が近づいてきます。\n\n2ウェーブの間、コアを守ってください。ターレットをもっと設置しましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.lead: 他の鉱石も使ってみましょう。[accent]鉛[]を見つけて、採掘しましょう。\n\nユニットからコアにドラッグして、資源を転送できます。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.smelter: 銅を鉛はやわらかい金属です。\nより硬い[accent]高密度合金[]を溶鉱炉で作りましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.densealloy: 溶鉱炉で作った合金を回収しましょう。\n\nまた、必要に応じて効率化しましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
コアは、採掘やブロックの修復のために[accent]スピリットドローン[]を作成しています。

他のユニットを作るには[accent]シリコン[]が必要です。
シリコン溶鉱炉を作りましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: シリコンには[accent]石炭[]と[accent]砂[]が必要です。\nまず、ドリルを作りましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.generator: この技術には電力が必要です。\n[accent]火力発電機[]を作りましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: 火力発電機には燃料が必要です。\nドリルから石炭を補給しましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.node: 電力を送電する必要があります。\n火力発電機の隣に[accent]電源ノード[]を作って、電力を供給しましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.nodelink: 電力は隣接している電力ブロックや発電機、接続された状態の電源ノードを使って送電することができます。\n\nノードをタップしてから、発電機とシリコン溶鉱炉を選択して電力を繋げましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.silicon: シリコン溶鉱炉で製造したシリコンを回収しましょう。\n\nまた、効率化をすることをお勧めします。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: [accent]ダガーユニット製造機[]を作りましょう。\n\nこれを使うと攻撃ユニットを作ってくれます。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.router: 生産機には電力が必要です。\nコンベアーから資源を分けるためにルーターを作りましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.dagger:
電源ノードを生産機に接続しましょう。
要件が揃うと、ユニットを作り始めます。

必要に応じて、ドリルや発電機、コンベアーを増やしましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.tutorial.battle: [LIGHT_GRAY]敵[]のコアが見つかりました。\nユニットやダガー機で敵の基地を破壊しましょう。
bundle_ja.properties.block.copper-wall.description: 安価な防壁ブロックです。\n最初のウェーブでコアやターレットを保護するのに有用です。
bundle_ja.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: 安価な大型防壁ブロックです。\n最初のウェーブでコアやターレットを保護するのに有用です。
bundle_ja.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: 強化された防壁ブロックです。\n敵からの保護により強固です。
bundle_ja.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: 強化された大型防壁ブロックです。\n敵からの保護により強固です。
bundle_ja.properties.block.phase-wall.description: トリウムの壁ほど強固ではないが、強力な弾でなければ弾き返すことができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: トリウムの壁ほど強固ではないが、強力な弾でなければ弾き返すことができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.surge-wall.description: 最も硬い防壁ブロックです。\nたまに攻撃されると敵に電撃を与えます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: 最も硬い大型防壁ブロックです。\nたまに攻撃されると敵に電撃を与えます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.door.description: 小さなドアブロックです。タップすることで開閉することができます。\nただし、ドアが開いている場合、弾や敵も通過できます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.door-large.description: 大きなドアブロックです。タップすることで開閉することができます。\nただし、ドアが開いている場合、弾や敵も通過できます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.mend-projector.description: 定期的に周辺のブロックを修復します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: ドリルやコンベアなど、近くの施設の効率を向上させます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.force-projector.description: 周囲に六角形の力場を作り出し、内部の建造物やユニットなどを守ります。
bundle_ja.properties.block.shock-mine.description: 敵が踏むと、ダメージを与えます。敵には見えません。
bundle_ja.properties.block.duo.description: 小さく安価なターレットです。
bundle_ja.properties.block.scatter.description: 中規模の対空型ターレットです。敵に鉛またはスクラップの塊を分散するように発射させます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.arc.description: 小型の電撃型ターレットです。敵に向かってランダムな半円状に電撃を放ちます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.hail.description: 小型の砲撃型ターレットです。
bundle_ja.properties.block.lancer.description: チャージビームを放つ中型のターレットです。
bundle_ja.properties.block.wave.description: バブルの連射攻撃をする中型のターレットです。
bundle_ja.properties.block.salvo.description: 一斉に攻撃を行う中型のターレットです。
bundle_ja.properties.block.swarmer.description: バーストミサイルで攻撃する中型ターレットです。
bundle_ja.properties.block.ripple.description: 同時に複数ショットを発射する大型ターレットです。
bundle_ja.properties.block.cyclone.description: 大型の連射型ターレットです。
bundle_ja.properties.block.fuse.description: 短距離攻撃が得意な大型のターレットです。
bundle_ja.properties.block.spectre.description: 一度に2発の強力な弾を放つ大型のターレットです。
bundle_ja.properties.block.meltdown.description: 強力な長距離攻撃が可能な大型のターレットです。
bundle_ja.properties.block.conveyor.description: 一般的なアイテム輸送ブロックです。アイテムを前方に移動し、自動的にターレットや機械などに搬入します。回転させることができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: 改良されたアイテム輸送ブロックです。通常のコンベアーよりも速くアイテムを輸送します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: 改良されたアイテム転送ブロックです。電力を使用して、離れた場所にあるフェーズコンベアーにアイテムを転送することができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.junction.description: 十字に交差したコンベアーをそれぞれ前方に搬出します。コンベアーで複雑な構造を組み立てるときに便利です。
bundle_ja.properties.block.mass-driver.description: 長距離の輸送が可能な上位アイテム輸送ブロックです。離れた別のマスドライバーにアイテムを発射します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: 石炭と砂からシリコンを製造します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: オイルとチタンからプラスタニウムを製造します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: 放射性トリウムと多量の砂からフェーズファイバーを製造します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: チタンや鉛、シリコン、銅からサージ合金を製造します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.pulverizer.description: 石を砕いて砂にします。自然の砂がない場合に有用です。
bundle_ja.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: 石炭、鉛、砂から燃えやすいピラタイトを製造します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: 可燃性のピラタイトを石油を使用してさらに爆発性化合物にします。
bundle_ja.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: 水とチタンから冷却に効率的な冷却水を製造します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.melter.description: 石を熱で溶かして溶岩を生成します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.incinerator.description: 不要なアイテムや液体を焼却します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.spore-press.description: 胞子ポッドを石油に圧縮します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.separator.description: 石を水圧で砕き、石に含まれる様々な鉱石を回収します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.power-node.description: 電力ノード間で電力の送電を行います。最大で4つの電力源やノードなどに接続できます。隣接するブロックから電力の送電や供給を行います。
bundle_ja.properties.block.power-node-large.description: 巨大な電力ノードです。最大で6つの電力源やノードに接続できます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.battery.description: 余分な電力の充電して、貯めておくことができます。必要があれば、溜まった電力を供給します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.battery-large.description: 通常のバッテリーよりもたくさんの電力を溜めておくことができます
bundle_ja.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: 石油や可燃性の物質を燃やして発電します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: 水を使って火力発電機より効率的に発電します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: 溶岩から大量の電力を発電します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.solar-panel.description: 太陽光から少量の電力を発電します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: 建設費が高価ですが、通常のソーラーパネルより大量の電力を発電することができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: 高い放射性を持ったトリウムから大量の電力を発電します。これには一定の冷却が必要です。冷却が不十分な場合、大きな爆発が発生します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: トリウムリアクターよりも発電量は少ないですが、冷却を必要としない放射性同位体熱発電機(RTG)です。
bundle_ja.properties.block.unloader.description: コンテナやボールト、コアからアイテムをコンベアーか隣接するブロックに搬出します。搬出機をタップして搬出するアイテムを変更することができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.container.description: 各種類のアイテムを少量ずつ保管します。隣接するコンテナーやボール卜、コアは一つのストレージユニットとして扱われます。 [LIGHT_GRAY]搬出機[]を使って、コンテナーからアイテムを搬出できます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.vault.description: 各種類のアイテムを大量に保管します。隣接するコンテナーやボール卜、コアは一つのストレージユニットとして扱われます。[LIGHT_GRAY]搬出機[]を使って、ボールトからアイテムを搬出できます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: 安価なドリルです。採掘可能な鉱脈に設置すると、アイテムを採掘して搬出します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: 速く採掘できるように改善されたドリルです。また、より硬い鉱石も採掘することができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.laser-drill.description: 電力を使用して、レーザー技術でより速く採掘することができます。また、放射性のトリウムを回収することができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.blast-drill.description: 上位のドリルです。大量の電力が必要です。
bundle_ja.properties.block.water-extractor.description: 地面から水を汲み上げます。近くに湖がない場合に有用です。
bundle_ja.properties.block.cultivator.description: 胞子の小さな集まりを工業用ポッドに培養します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: 大量の電力を使用して、砂から石油を回収します。近くに油田がない場合に有用です。
bundle_ja.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: 機体を重装備の爆撃機に乗り換えます。\nパッドに乗ってダブルタップすることで使用することができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: 機体を高速で強力な電撃砲を搭載した迎撃機に乗り換えます。\nパッドに乗ってダブルタップすることで使用することができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: 機体を重装備の大型攻撃機に乗り換えます。\nパッドに乗ってダブルタップすることで使用することができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: 機体を味方の建造物やユニットの修復が可能な支援型機体に乗り換えます。\nパッドに乗ってダブルタップすることで使用することができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: 機体を高速で突撃攻撃に向いた軽装備の機体に乗り換えます。\nパッドに乗ってダブルタップすることで使用することができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: 機体を最前線での戦闘に向いた重装備の機体に乗り換えます。\nパッドに乗ってダブルタップすることで使用することができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: 鉱石の採掘やブロックの修復を行う小型のドローンユニットのスピリットを製造します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: スピリットドローンの性能を遥かに凌ぐ上位のドローンユニットのファントムドローンを製造します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.wraith-factory.description: 高速で突撃攻撃が可能な迎撃ユニットのレースファイターを製造します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.ghoul-factory.description: 大型の爆撃機のグールを製造します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.dagger-factory.description: 基本的な地上ユニットのダガーを製造します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.titan-factory.description: 改良された武装地上ユニットのタイタンを製造します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.fortress-factory.description: 大型の砲撃地上ユニットのフォートレスを製造します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.revenant-factory.description: 大型のレーザー航空ユニットのレベナントを製造します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.repair-point.description: 近くの負傷したユニットを修復します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.conduit.description: 一般的な液体輸送ブロックです。液体版のコンベアーです。ポンプや他のパイプに使うことができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: 改良された液体輸送ブロックです。通常のパイプより速く、たくさんのアイテムを輸送することができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: 改良された液体輸送ブロックです。電力を使用して、液体を他の離れたフェーズパイプに転送することができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.liquid-router.description: 搬入したアイテムをほかの3方向に均等に搬出します。液体の漏れを防ぐことができます。一つの資源から複数に分ける際などに使われます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: 大量の液体を保管しておくことができます。需要が不安定な製造設備や重要な施設の冷却水の予備などとして使用されます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: パイプを他のパイプと交差できるようにします。それぞれ搬入した液体を前方に搬出します。パイプで複雑な構造を組み立てるときなどに使われます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: 高度な液体輸送ブロックです。地形や建物を超えて、3ブロック離れた場所に液体を輸送することができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: 安価なポンプです。搬出速度は遅いですが、電力を使わず使用できます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: 改良されたポンプです。電力を使用して2倍速く搬出することができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: 最高性能のポンプです。
bundle_ja.properties.block.router.description: 搬入したアイテムをほかの3方向に均等に搬出します。一つの資源から複数に分ける際などに使われます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.distributor.description: 高度なルーターです。搬入したアイテムをほかの7方向に均等に分けて搬出します。
bundle_ja.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: 高度な輸送ブロックです。地形や建物を超えて、3ブロック離れた場所にアイテムを輸送することができます。
bundle_ja.properties.block.item-source.description: アイテムを無限に搬出します。サンドボックスのみ。
bundle_ja.properties.block.liquid-source.description: 液体を無限に搬出します。サンドボックスのみ。
bundle_ja.properties.block.item-void.description: 電力を必要とせずにアイテムを廃棄します。サンドボックスのみ。
bundle_ja.properties.block.power-source.description: 無限に電力を出力します。サンドボックスのみ。
bundle_ja.properties.block.power-void.description: 入力されたすべての電力を破棄します。サンドボックスのみ。
bundle_ja.properties.liquid.water.description: 機械の冷却や廃棄物の処理など幅広く使われている液体です。
bundle_ja.properties.liquid.oil.description: 燃焼させたり、爆発させたり、冷却水としても使用される液体です。
bundle_ja.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: 冷却に特化した液体です。

bundle_ko.properties.discord: mindustry discord 에 참여 해 보세요!

bundle_ko.properties.screenshot.invalid: 맵이 너무 커서 스크린샷을 찍을 메모리가 충분하지 않습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.placeline: 블록을 선택하셨습니다.\n][accent]몇초간 설치 시작지점을 누르고[] 원하는 방향을 향해 드래그 하면 [accent]일렬로[] 설치할 수 있습니다.\n한번 해 보세요.
bundle_ko.properties.removearea: 블록 제거모드를 선택하셨습니다.\n[accent]몇초간 제거 시작지점을 누르고[] 원하는 구역 끝을 향해 드래그 하면 [accent]직사각형[] 안에 있는 모든 건물을 제거할 수 있습니다.\n한번 해 보세요.

bundle_ko.properties.name: 이름 :
bundle_ko.properties.server.kicked.clientOutdated: 오래된 버전의 클라이언트 입니다! 게임을 업데이트 하세요!
bundle_ko.properties.server.kicked.serverOutdated: 오래된 버전의 서버입니다! 서버 호스트 관리자에게 문의하세요!
bundle_ko.properties.server.kicked.banned: 서버 규칙 위반으로 인해, 이제 당신은 영원히 이 서버를 플레이 하실 수 없습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.server.kicked.recentKick: 방금 추방처리 되었습니다.\n잠시 기다린 후에 접속 해 주세요.
bundle_ko.properties.server.kicked.nameEmpty: 닉네임에는 반드시 영어 또는 숫자가 있어야 합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.server.kicked.idInUse: 이미 서버에 접속중입니다! 다중 계정은 허용되지 않습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.server.kicked.customClient: 이 서버는 직접 빌드한 버전을 지원하지 않습니다. 공식 버전을 사용하세요.
bundle_ko.properties.host.info:
[accent]호스트[] 버튼은 현재 네트워크의 [scarlet]6567[] 포트를 사용합니다.
[LIGHT_GRAY]같은 Wi-Fi 또는 로컬 네트워크[] 에서 서버 목록을 볼 수 있습니다.

만약 플레이어들이 이 IP를 통해 어디에서나 연결할 수 있게 하고 싶다면, 공유기 설정에서 [accent]포트 포워딩[]을 해야 합니다.

[LIGHT_GRAY]참고: LAN 게임 연결에 문제가 있는 사람이 있다면, 방화벽 설정에서 Mindustry 가 로컬 네트워크에 액세스하도록 허용했는지 확인 해 주세요.
bundle_ko.properties.join.info:
여기서 [accent]서버 IP[]를 입력하여 다른 서버에 접속할 수 있습니다.
또는 [accent]로컬 네트워크(LAN)[] 서버를 검색하여 접속할 수 있습니다.
LAN 및 WAN 멀티 플레이어 모두 지원됩니다.

[LIGHT_GRAY]참고:여기에서는 자동으로 글로벌 서버를 추가하지 않습니다. IP로 다른 사람의 서버에 접속할려면 서버장에게 IP를 요청해야 합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.invalidid: 잘못된 클라이언트 ID 입니다! 버그 보고서를 제출 해 주세요.
bundle_ko.properties.joingame.title: 게임 참가
bundle_ko.properties.save.old: 이 저장파일은 이전 버전의 게임용이며, 지금은 사용할 수 없습니다. \n\n[LIGHT_GRAY]4.0 정식때 이전 게임버전에서 만든 저장파일과 호환됩니다.
bundle_ko.properties.save.corrupted: [accent]세이브 파일이 손상되었거나 잘못된 파일입니다! 만약 게임을 업데이트 했다면 이것은 아마 저장 형식 변경일 것이고, 이것은 버그가 [scarlet]아닙니다[].

bundle_ko.properties.item.titanium.name: 티타늄
bundle_ko.properties.item.titanium.description: 파이프 재료나 고급 드릴, 비행기/기체 등에서 재료로 사용되는 자원입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.item.thorium.name: 토륨
bundle_ko.properties.item.thorium.description: 건물의 재료, 터렛의 탄약 또는 핵연료로 사용되는 방사성 금속입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.item.silicon.name: 실리콘
bundle_ko.properties.item.silicon.description: 매우 유용한 반도체로, 기체를 만들거나 태양 전지판 등 전자 건물에 사용할 수 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.item.plastanium.name: 플라스터늄
bundle_ko.properties.item.plastanium.description: 고급 항공기 및 분열 탄약에 사용되는 가벼운 연성 재료.
bundle_ko.properties.item.phase-fabric.name: 위상 패브릭
bundle_ko.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: 최첨단 전자 제품과 자기수리 기술에 사용되는 거의 무중력에 가까운 물질입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.item.surge-alloy.name: 서지 합금
bundle_ko.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: 독특한 전기 특성을 가진 고급 합금입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.item.spore-pod.name: 포자 포드
bundle_ko.properties.item.spore-pod.description: 석유, 폭발물 및 연료로 전환하는데 사용됩니다.
bundle_ko.properties.item.sand.name: 모래
bundle_ko.properties.item.sand.description: 고밀도 합금 제작이나 제련시 이 광물을 사용하여 소모 재료를 줄이는 등 광범위하게 사용되는 일반적인 재료입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.item.blast-compound.name: 폭발 화합물
bundle_ko.properties.item.blast-compound.description: 터렛 및 건설의 재료로 사용되는 휘발성 폭발물.\n연료로도 사용할 수 있지만, 별로 추천하지는 않습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.item.pyratite.name: 피라타이트
bundle_ko.properties.item.pyratite.description: 폭발성을 가진 재료로, 주로 터렛의 탄약으로 사용됩니다.
bundle_ko.properties.item.metaglass.name: 메타유리
bundle_ko.properties.item.metaglass.description: 초강력 유리 화합물. 액체 분배 및 저장에 광범위하게 사용됩니다.
bundle_ko.properties.item.scrap.name: 조각
bundle_ko.properties.item.scrap.description: 오래된 건물과 유닛의 남은 잔해. 미량의 많은 금속이 포함되어 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.liquid.water.name: 물
bundle_ko.properties.liquid.slag.name: 광재
bundle_ko.properties.liquid.oil.name: 석유
bundle_ko.properties.liquid.cryofluid.name: 냉각유체
bundle_ko.properties.mech.alpha-mech.name: 알파
bundle_ko.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: 표준 기체.\n적절한 속도와 공격력을 갖추고 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.mech.delta-mech.name: 델타
bundle_ko.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: 빠르게 이동하는 적을 처치하기 위한 가벼운 기체.\n구조물에는 거의 피해를 주지 않지만, 전격 무기를 사용하여 많은 적군을 매우 빠르게 죽일 수 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.mech.tau-mech.name: 타우
bundle_ko.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: 지원형 기체.\n총을 발사하여 건물을 치료하고 회복 능력 사용으로 화재를 진압하거나, 반경 내 아군을 치유시킵니다.
bundle_ko.properties.mech.omega-mech.name: 오메가
bundle_ko.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: 지상 기체 최종판이자 건물 파괴용으로 적합한 부피가 크고 튼튼한 기체.\n방어 모드는 최대 90% 의 피해를 줄일 수 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.mech.dart-ship.name: 다트
bundle_ko.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: 표준 비행선.\n빠르고 가볍지만 공격력이 거의 없고 채광 속도가 느립니다.
bundle_ko.properties.mech.javelin-ship.name: 재블린
bundle_ko.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: 치고 빠지는 공격을 위한 비행선.\n처음에는 느리지만, 가속도가 붙어 엄청난 속도로 미사일 피해를 입힐 수 있으며, 전격 능력을 사용할 수 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.mech.trident-ship.name: 삼지창
bundle_ko.properties.mech.glaive-ship.name: 글레브
bundle_ko.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: 크고 잘 무장된 총을 가진 비행선.\n방화용 리피터가 장착되어 있으며, 가속도와 최대속도가 높습니다.

bundle_ko.properties.unit.phantom.description: 첨단 드론 유닛.\n광석을 자동으로 채광하며, 아이템을 수집하고 블록을 수리합니다. 일반 드론보다 훨씬 효과적입니다.

bundle_ko.properties.unit.crawler.name: 크롤러
bundle_ko.properties.unit.titan.name: 타이탄
bundle_ko.properties.unit.titan.description: 고급 지상 유닛입니다.\n원거리 총 대신에 근접 화염 방사기를 가지고 있으며, 지상과 공중 둘다 공격할 수 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.unit.ghoul.name: 구울 폭격기
bundle_ko.properties.unit.ghoul.description: 무겁고 튼튼한 지상 폭격기 입니다.\n주로 적 건물로 이동하여 엄청난 폭격을 가합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.unit.wraith.name: 유령 전투기
bundle_ko.properties.unit.wraith.description: 적 핵심 건물 및 유닛을 집중적으로 공격하는 방식을 사용하는 전투기 입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.unit.fortress.name: 포트리스
bundle_ko.properties.unit.fortress.description: 중포 지상 유닛.\n높은 공격력을 가진 총과 높은 체력을 가지고 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.unit.revenant.name: 레비던트
bundle_ko.properties.unit.eruptor.name: 이어럽터
bundle_ko.properties.unit.chaos-array.name: 카오스 배열
bundle_ko.properties.unit.eradicator.name: 박멸
bundle_ko.properties.unit.lich.name: 리치
bundle_ko.properties.unit.reaper.name: 사신
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.begin:
플레이어의 주요 목표는 [LIGHT_GRAY]적군[]을 제거하는 것입니다.

이 게임은 [accent]구리를 채광[]하는 것으로 시작합니다.
이것을 하기 위해 플레이어의 중심부 근처에 있는 구리 광맥을 누르세요.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.drill: 수동으로 채광하는 것은 효율이 낮습니다.\n[accent]드릴[]은 자동으로 채광 작업을 합니다.\n구리 광맥에 표시된 영역에 드릴을 하나를 놓으세요.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]컨베이어[]를 사용하여 아이템을 코어로 운반합니다.\n드릴에서 코어까지 컨베이어 라인을 만드세요.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.morecopper: 더 많은 구리가 필요합니다.\n\n수동으로 채광하거나, 드릴을 더 설치하세요.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.turret: 방어 구조물은 [LIGHT_GRAY]적[]을 물리치기 위해 반드시 필요합니다.\n기지 근처에 듀오 터렛을 설치하세요.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.drillturret: 듀오 터렛이 작동하기 위해서는[accent] 구리 탄약 []을 필요로 합니다.\n터렛 옆에 드릴을 설치하여 구리를 공급하세요.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.waves: [LIGHT_GRAY]적[]이 접근합니다.\n\n2단계 동안 코어를 보호하고 더 많은 터렛을 만드세요.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.lead: 더 많은 광석을 이용할 수 있습니다. [accent]납[]을 찾아 탐색하세요.\n\n아이템을 코어로 전송할려면 플레이어 기체 또는 비행기에서 코어로 드래그 하세요.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.smelter:
구리와 납은 약한 금속입니다.
[accent]고밀도 합금[]은 제련소에서 만들 수 있습니다.

하나 만드세요.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.densealloy: 이 제련소는 이제 고밀도 합금을 생산할 것입니다.\n몇개 더 생산하세요.\n필요한 경우 더 만드세요.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
이제 이코어는 채굴과 수리하기 위한[accent] 스피릿 드론[]을 생성 할 것 입니다.

[accent]실리콘[]을 사용해 다른 유닛을 생성하기 위한 공장을 만들 수 있습니다.
실리콘 제련기를 제작하세요!
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: 실리콘을 제작하려면[accent] 석탄[] 과[accent] 모래[]가 필요합니다.\n드릴을 먼저 건설해보는건 어떤가요?
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.generator: 이 건물은 [LIGHT_YELLOW]전력[]이 필요합니다.\n[accent] 석탄 발전기[]를 건설하세요.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: [accent] 석탄 발전기[]는 연료가 필요합니다.\n[accent] 석탄[]을 드릴로 채굴해서 연료를 체워주세요.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.node: 전력은 송신해줄 노드가 필요합니다.\n[accent] 전력 노드[]를 석탄 등등 발전기 옆에 설치해서 생산된 전기를 다른곳으로 송신합시다.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.nodelink: 전력은 전력 블록과 발전기에 연결하거나, 연결된 전력 노드를 통해 전송이 가능합니다. \n\n전력 노드를 누르고 발전기와 실리콘 제련기를 선택하여 전원을 연결합시다.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.silicon: 실리콘이 생산되고 있습니다.\n\n생산 시스템의 개선을 권고 드립니다.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: 이[accent] 디거 기체 공장[]은\n\n공격하는 기체를 생산하기 위해 사용됩니다.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.router: 공장을 작동시키기 위해 자원이 필요합니다.\n컨베이어에 운반되고 있는 자원을 분할할 분배기를 만드세요.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.dagger:
전력 노드를 공장에 연결하세요.
일단 요구 사항이 충족되면 기체 생산을 시작합니다.

필요에 따라 드릴 및 발전기, 컨베이어를 더 많이 만들 수 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.tutorial.battle: [LIGHT_GRAY]적[]의 코어가 드러났습니다.\n당신의 부대와 디거를 사용하여 파괴하세요.
bundle_ko.properties.block.copper-wall.description: 싸구려 방어블록.\n처음에 몇번 웨이브에서 건물과 터렛을 보호하는 데 유용함.
bundle_ko.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: 싸구려 방어블록.\n처음에 몇번 웨이브에서 건물과 터렛을 보호하는 데 유용함.\n4개를 합친 블록입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: 강력한 방어블록.\n적 공격으로부터 좋은 보호를 할 수 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: 강력한 방어블록.\n적 공격으로부터 좋은 보호를 할 수 있습니다.\n4개를 합친 블록입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.phase-wall.description: 토륨 벽만큼 강하지 않지만 벽을 향해 날아오는 총알이 너무 강력하지 않으면 총알을 튕겨냅니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: 토륨 벽만큼 강하지 않지만 벽을 향해 날아오는 총알이 너무 강력하지 않으면 총알을 튕겨냅니다.\n4개를 합친 블록입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.surge-wall.description: 최강 방어블록.\n공격을 받으면 낮은 확률로 공격자에게 전격 공격을 합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: 최강 방어블록.\n공격을 받으면 낮은 확률로 공격자에게 전격 공격을 합니다.\n4개를 합친 블록입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.door.description: 눌러서 열고 닫을 수 있는 작은 문.\n만약 문이 열리면, 적들은 총을 쏘며 문을 통과할 수 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.door-large.description: 누르는 것으로 여닫을 수 있는 큰 문.\n만약 문이 열리면, 적들은 총을 쏘며 문을 통과할 수 있습니다.\n4개를 합친 블록입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: 드릴과 컨베이어와 같은 인근 건물의 속도를 높여줍니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.force-projector.description: 총알에게서 내부의 건물과 유닛을 보호하면서 그 주위에 육각형 보호막을 만듭니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.shock-mine.description: 지뢰를 밟는 적에게 피해를 줍니다. 적에게는 거의 보이지 않습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_ko.properties.block.arc.description: 적을 향해 무작위 각도로 전기를 쏘는 작은 터렛.
bundle_ko.properties.block.wave.description: 액체를 뿜는 중간 크기의 속화 터렛.
bundle_ko.properties.block.ripple.description: 여러 발의 사격을 동시에 하는 대형 포대.
bundle_ko.properties.block.fuse.description: 강력한 단거리 빔을 쏘는 대형 터렛.
bundle_ko.properties.block.spectre.description: 한 번에 두 발의 강력한 총알을 쏘는 대형 터렛.
bundle_ko.properties.block.meltdown.description: 강력한 장거리 빔을 쏘는 대형 터렛.
bundle_ko.properties.block.conveyor.description: 기본 아이템 수송 블록. 아이템을 앞으로 이동시켜 자동으로 터렛이나 건물에 넣어줍니다. 회전식.
bundle_ko.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: 고급 아이템 운송 블록. 표준 컨베이어보다 아이템을 더 빨리 이동시킨다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: 고급품 수송 블록. 여러 타일을 통해 아이템을 연결된 위상 컨베이어로 텔레포트하기 위해 전력을 사용합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.junction.description: 2개의 컨베이어 벨트를 교차시키는 다리 역할을 합니다. 서로 다른 재료를 다른 장소로 운반하는 두 개의 다른 컨베이어의 상황에서 유용합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.mass-driver.description: 최강 아이템 수송 블록. 몇 가지 아이템을 모아 장거리에서 또 다른 매스 드라이버에게 발사합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: 고순도 석탄으로 모래를 줄여 실리콘을 생산합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: 방사능 토륨과 많은 량의 모래에서 상직물을 생산합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: 티타늄, 납, 실리콘, 구리로부터 서지 합금을 생산합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.pulverizer.description: 모래로 을 부숩니다. 천연 모래가 부족할 때 유용합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: 석탄, 납, 모래를 가연성이 높은 피라타이트로 만듭니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: 기름을 사용하여 피라타이트를 인화성은 떨어지지만 폭발성은 높은 폭발성 화합물로 변환시킵니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: 물과 티타늄을 냉각에 훨씬 더 효과적인 냉동액으로 결합시킵니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.melter.description: 고철을 녹여 더 많은 처리나 터렛의 사용을 위해 광재에 녹입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.incinerator.description: 불필요한 아이템을 소각시켜 줄 수 있는 건물입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.separator.description: 돌을 분해하여 각종 자원으로 재활용 할 수 있게 해 주는 건물입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.power-node.description: 전원을 연결된 노드로 전송합니다. 최대 4개의 동력원, 싱크 또는 노드를 연결할 수 있습니다. 노드는 인접한 블록으로부터 전원을 공급하거나 공급받을 수 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.power-node-large.description: 생성된 전력를 다른 건물로 전달하기 위한 건물이며, 일반 노드보다 더 많은 전력을 이동시킬 수 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.battery.description: 전력 생산량에 여유가 있을경우, 생산된 잉여 전력을 여기에 저장합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.battery-large.description: 일반 배터리보다 훨씬 많은 량의 전력을 저장합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: 기름이나 인화성 물질을 태워 전력을 발생시킵니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: 연소 발생기보다 효율적이지만, 추가 액체가 필요합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: 일반 태양 전지판보다 훨씬 나은 전력을 공급하지만, 건축비도 훨씬 비쌉니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: 고방사능 토륨으로부터 막대한 양의 전력을 발생시킵니다. 지속적인 냉각이 필요하며 냉각제의 양이 부족하면 크게 폭발합니다. 전력 출력은 최대 용량에서 기본 전력을 발생시키는 완전성에 따라 결정됩니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: 냉각은 필요 없지만 토륨 원자로에 비해 전력을 적게 공급하는 방사성 동위원소 열전 발생기.
bundle_ko.properties.block.unloader.description: 컨테이너, 금고 또는 코어에서 인접한 블록으로 아이템을 출하합니다. 출하시킬 아이템의 종류는 언로더를 눌러 지정할 수 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.container.description: 각종 소량의 자원을 저장할 수 있습니다.[LIGHT_GRAY]언로더[]를 사용하여 컨테이너에서 물건을 회수할 수 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.vault.description: 각종 대량의 자원을 저장할 수 있습니다.[LIGHT_GRAY]언로더[]를 사용하여 금고에서 물건을 회수할 수 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: 싸구려 드릴. 적절한 타일 위에 놓였을때 매우 느린 속도로 계속 출력합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: 기압을 이용하여 보다 빠르고 단단한 물질을 채광할 수 있는 향상된 드릴.
bundle_ko.properties.block.laser-drill.description: 토륨을 채광할 수 있는 최고급 드릴입니다. 전력과 물을 공급하여 빠른 속도로 채광할 수 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.water-extractor.description: 땅에서 물을 추출합니다. 근처에 호수가 없을 때 사용하세요.
bundle_ko.properties.block.cultivator.description: 소량의 포자를 산업용으로 준비된 포자로 배양하는 건물입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: 모래에서 기름을 추출하기 위해 대량을 전력을 사용합니다. 근처에 직접적인 석유 공급원이 없을때 사용하세요.
bundle_ko.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: 지금 타고있는 배를 떠나 잘 무장된 중폭격기로 갈아타세요.\n누르거나 클릭하여 이 기체로 바꿉니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: 지금 타고있는 배를 떠나 전격 무기와 강력하고 빠른 요격체로 변신합니다.\n누르거나 클릭하여 이 기체로 바꿉니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: 지금 타고있는 배를 떠나 크고 잘 무장된 기체로 갈아타세요.\n누르거나 클릭하여 이 기체로 바꿉니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: 지금 타고있는 배를 떠나 아군 건물이나 유닛을 치료할 수 있는 지원형 기체로 갈아타세요.\n누르거나 클릭하여 이 기체로 바꿉니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: 지금 타고있는 배를 떠나 뺑소니 공격을 위해 만들어진 빠르고 가벼운 기체로 갈아타세요.\n누르거나 클릭하여 이 기체로 바꿉니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: 지금 타고있는 배를 떠나 최전방 공격을 위해 만든 부피가 크고 잘 무장된 기체로 갈아타세요.\n누르거나 클릭하여 이 기체로 바꿉니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: 광석을 채굴하고 블록을 수리하는 경량 드론을 생산합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: 스피릿 드론보다 훨씬 효과적인 첨단 드론 유닛을 생산합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.revenant-factory.description: 중량의 레이저 포대를 가진 공중부대를 생산합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.repair-point.description: 주변에서 가장 가까운 손상된 유닛을 지속적으로 치료합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.conduit.description: 일반 파이프.\n액체가 지나갈 수 있도록 해 줍니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: 고급 액체 수송블록. 일반 파이프보다 액체 운송 속도가 빠릅니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: 고급 액체 수송블록. 물을 먼거리로 순간이동 시켜 주는 장치입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.liquid-router.description: 물펌프를 다른 방향으로 분배할 수 있게 하는 블럭입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: 액체 종류를 저장할 수 있는 물탱크 입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: 물펌프와 다른 물펌프를 서로 교차시키게 할 수 있는 블럭입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: 다리와 다리 사이를 연결하여 액체가 지나갈 수 있게 해 줍니다.\n주로 다리 사이에 지나갈 수 없는 장애물이 있을 때 사용합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: 느린 속도로 물을 퍼올리는 펌프입니다. 대신 전력이 필요없습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: 일반 물 펌프보다 더 빠른 속도로 물을 끌어올릴 수 있는 펌프입니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.router.description: 한 방향에서 아이템을 널은 후 최대 3개의 다른 방향으로 균등하게 출력합니다. 재료를 한곳에서 여러 개의 목표로 분할하는 데 유용합니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.distributor.description: 아이템을 최대 7개의 다른 방향으로 똑같이 분할하는 고급 분배기.
bundle_ko.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: 고급 자원 수송 블록.\n지형이나 건물을 넘어 최대 3개 타일을 건너뛰고 자원을 운송할 수 있습니다.
bundle_ko.properties.block.item-source.description: 자원을 선택하면 그 자원이 무한하게 생성되는 블록입니다. 샌드박스 전용.
bundle_ko.properties.block.power-source.description: 무한한 전력을 공급해주는 블록입니다. 샌드박스 전용.
bundle_ko.properties.liquid.oil.description: 연소, 폭발 또는 냉각제로 사용될 수 있다.

bundle_nl.properties.host.info:
The [accent]host[] button hosts a server on port [scarlet]6567[]. 
Anybody on the same [LIGHT_GRAY]wifi or local network[] should be able to see your server in their server list.

If you want people to be able to connect from anywhere by IP, [accent]port forwarding[] is required.

[LIGHT_GRAY]Note: If someone is experiencing trouble connecting to your LAN game, make sure you have allowed Mindustry access to your local network in your firewall settings.
bundle_nl.properties.join.info:
Here, you can enter a [accent]server IP[] to connect to, or discover [accent]local network[] servers to connect to.
Both LAN and WAN multiplayer is supported.

[LIGHT_GRAY]Note: There is no automatic global server list; if you want to connect to someone by IP, you would need to ask the host for their IP.

bundle_nl.properties.item.copper.name: Copper
bundle_nl.properties.item.copper.description: A useful structure material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.item.lead.name: Lead
bundle_nl.properties.item.lead.description: A basic starter material. Used extensively in electronics and liquid transportation blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.item.coal.name: Coal
bundle_nl.properties.item.coal.description: A common and readily available fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.graphite.name: Graphite
bundle_nl.properties.item.titanium.name: Titanium
bundle_nl.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_nl.properties.item.thorium.name: Thorium
bundle_nl.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.silicon.name: Silicon
bundle_nl.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor, with applications in solar panels and many complex electronics.
bundle_nl.properties.item.plastanium.name: Plastanium
bundle_nl.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_nl.properties.item.phase-fabric.name: Phase Fabric
bundle_nl.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_nl.properties.item.surge-alloy.name: Surge Alloy
bundle_nl.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_nl.properties.item.spore-pod.name: Spore Pod
bundle_nl.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.sand.name: Sand
bundle_nl.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_nl.properties.item.blast-compound.name: Blast Compound
bundle_nl.properties.item.blast-compound.description: A volatile compound used in bombs and explosives. While it can burned as fuel, this is not advised.
bundle_nl.properties.item.pyratite.name: Pyratite
bundle_nl.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_nl.properties.item.metaglass.name: Metaglass
bundle_nl.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_nl.properties.item.scrap.name: Scrap
bundle_nl.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.water.name: Water
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.slag.name: Slag
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.oil.name: Oil
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.cryofluid.name: Cryofluid
bundle_nl.properties.mech.alpha-mech.name: Alpha
bundle_nl.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: The standard mech. Has decent speed and damage output; can create up to 3 drones for increased offensive capability.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.delta-mech.name: Delta
bundle_nl.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: A fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks. Does little damage against structures, but can kill large groups of enemy units very quickly with its arc lightning weapons.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.tau-mech.name: Tau
bundle_nl.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: The support mech. Heals allied blocks by shooting at them. Can heal allies in a radius with its repair ability.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.omega-mech.name: Omega
bundle_nl.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: A bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults. Its armor ability can block up to 90% of incoming damage.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.dart-ship.name: Dart
bundle_nl.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: The standard ship. Reasonably fast and light, but has little offensive capability and low mining speed.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.javelin-ship.name: Javelin
bundle_nl.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: A hit-and-run strike ship. While initially slow, it can accelerate to great speeds and fly by enemy outposts, dealing large amounts of damage with its lightning ability and missiles.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.trident-ship.name: Trident
bundle_nl.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: A heavy bomber. Reasonably well armored.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.glaive-ship.name: Glaive
bundle_nl.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: A large, well-armored gunship. Equipped with an incendiary repeater. Good acceleration and maximum speed.

bundle_nl.properties.unit.spirit.description: The starter drone unit. Spawns in the core by default. Automatically mines ores and repairs blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.phantom.name: Phantom Drone
bundle_nl.properties.unit.phantom.description: An advanced drone unit. Automatically mines ores and repairs blocks. Significantly more effective than a spirit drone.

bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.begin: Your mission here is to eradicate the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\n\nBegin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.drill: Mining manually is inefficient.\n[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.\nPlace one on a copper vein.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.\nMake a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.morecopper: More copper is required.\n\nEither mine it manually, or place more drills.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\nBuild a duo turret near your base.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.\nPlace a drill next to the turret to supply it with mined copper.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.waves: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] approaches.\n\nDefend your core for 2 waves. Build more turrets.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.lead: More ores are available. Explore and mine[accent] lead[].\n\nDrag from your unit to the core to transfer resources.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.smelter:
Copper and lead are weak metals.
Superior[accent] Dense Alloy[] can be created in a smelter.

Build one.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.densealloy: The smelter will now produce alloy.\nGet some.\nImprove the production if necessary.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
The core will now create a[accent] spirit drone[] for mining and repairing blocks.

Factories for other units can be created with [accent] silicon.
Make a silicon smelter.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: Silicon requires[accent] coal[] and[accent] sand[].\nStart by making drills.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.generator: This technology requires power.\nCreate a[accent] combustion generator[] for it.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: Combustion generators need fuel.\nFuel it with coal from a drill.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.node: Power requires transport.\nCreate a[accent] power node[] next to your combustion generator to transfer its power.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.nodelink: Power can be transferred through contacting power blocks and generators, or by linked power nodes.\n\nLink power by tapping the node and selecting the generator and silicon smelter.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.silicon: Silicon is being produced. Get some.\n\nImproving the production system is advised.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: Construct a[accent] dagger mech factory.[]\n\nThis will be used to create attack mechs.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.router: Factories need resources to function.\nCreate a router to split conveyor resources.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.dagger:
Link power nodes to the factory.
Once requirements are met, a mech will be created.

Create more drills, generators and conveyors as necessary.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.battle: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] has revealed their core.\nDestroy it with your unit and dagger mechs.
bundle_nl.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_nl.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_nl.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_nl.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals blocks in its vicinity.
bundle_nl.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_nl.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_nl.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_nl.properties.block.arc.description: A small turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_nl.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_nl.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_nl.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_nl.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_nl.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_nl.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coal in order to produce silicon.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_nl.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes stone into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_nl.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_nl.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_nl.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in turrets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_nl.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_nl.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_nl.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_nl.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_nl.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at half capacity.
bundle_nl.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_nl.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_nl.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. Adjacent containers, vaults and cores will be treated as a single storage unit. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_nl.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. Adjacent containers, vaults and cores will be treated as a single storage unit. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_nl.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_nl.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_nl.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_nl.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates spores with water in order to obtain biomatter.
bundle_nl.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_nl.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_nl.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_nl.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_nl.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: The ultimate pump. Three times as fast as a mechanical pump and the only pump which is able to retrieve lava.
bundle_nl.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_nl.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.server.kicked.customClient: Deze server ondersteunt geen aangepaste versies (mods). Download een officiële versie.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.host.info:
Ook De [accent]host[] knop hosts een server op poort [scarlet]6567[]. 
Iedereen die verbonden is met dezelfde [LIGHT_GRAY]wifi of lokaal netwerk[] zou je server moeten zien in zijn server lijst.

Als je wil dat personen kunnen verbinden met je server van ergens anders via IP. Dan is [accent]port forwarding[] is nodig.

[LIGHT_GRAY]Nota: Als iemand problemen heeft met het verbinden tot je LAN spel, zorg dan dat mindustry toestemming heeft tot je lokale netwerk in de Firewall instellingen.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.join.info: Hier kan je een [accent]server IP[] invullen waarmee je wil verbinden. Je kan hier ook verbinden met servers op je [accent]lokale netwerk[]. LAN en WAN multiplayer wordt ondersteund.\n\n[LIGHT_GRAY]Belangrijk: er is geen automatische globale server lijst; als je met iemand wil verbinden via een IP adres moet je zijn/haar IP adres vragen.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.hosts.none: [lightgray]Geen games op je lokale netwerk gevonden.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.map.nospawn.pvp: This map does not have any enemy cores for player to spawn into! Add[SCARLET] non-blue[] cores to this map in the editor.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.map.nospawn.attack: This map does not have any enemy cores for player to attack! Add[SCARLET] red[] cores to this map in the editor.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.copper.name: Copper
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.copper.description: A useful structure material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.lead.name: Lead
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.lead.description: A basic starter material. Used extensively in electronics and liquid transportation blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.coal.name: Coal
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.coal.description: A common and readily available fuel.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.graphite.name: Graphite
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.titanium.name: Titanium
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.thorium.name: Thorium
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.silicon.name: Silicon
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor, with applications in solar panels and many complex electronics.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.plastanium.name: Plastanium
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.phase-fabric.name: Phase Fabric
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.surge-alloy.name: Surge Alloy
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.spore-pod.name: Spore Pod
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.sand.name: Sand
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.blast-compound.name: Blast Compound
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.blast-compound.description: A volatile compound used in bombs and explosives. While it can burned as fuel, this is not advised.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.pyratite.name: Pyratite
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.metaglass.name: Metaglass
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.scrap.name: Scrap
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.water.name: Water
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.slag.name: Slag
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.oil.name: Oil
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.cryofluid.name: Cryofluid
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.alpha-mech.name: Alpha
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: The standard mech. Has decent speed and damage output.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.delta-mech.name: Delta
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: A fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks. Does little damage against structures, but can kill large groups of enemy units very quickly with its arc lightning weapons.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.tau-mech.name: Tau
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: The support mech. Heals allied blocks by shooting at them. Can heal allies in a radius with its repair ability.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.omega-mech.name: Omega
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: A bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults. Its armor ability can block up to 90% of incoming damage.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.dart-ship.name: Dart
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: The standard ship. Reasonably fast and light, but has little offensive capability and low mining speed.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.javelin-ship.name: Javelin
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: A hit-and-run strike ship. While initially slow, it can accelerate to great speeds and fly by enemy outposts, dealing large amounts of damage with its lightning ability and missiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.trident-ship.name: Trident
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: A heavy bomber. Reasonably well armored.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.glaive-ship.name: Glaive
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: A large, well-armored gunship. Equipped with an incendiary repeater. Good acceleration and maximum speed.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.unit.lich.name: Lich
bundle_nl_BE.properties.unit.reaper.name: Reaper
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.begin: Your mission here is to eradicate the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\n\nBegin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.drill: Mining manually is inefficient.\n[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.\nPlace one on a copper vein.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.\nMake a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.morecopper: More copper is required.\n\nEither mine it manually, or place more drills.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\nBuild a duo turret near your base.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.\nPlace a drill next to the turret to supply it with mined copper.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.waves: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] approaches.\n\nDefend your core for 2 waves. Build more turrets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.lead: More ores are available. Explore and mine[accent] lead[].\n\nDrag from your unit to the core to transfer resources.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.smelter:
Copper and lead are weak metals.
Superior[accent] Dense Alloy[] can be created in a smelter.

Build one.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.densealloy: The smelter will now produce alloy.\nGet some.\nImprove the production if necessary.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
The core will now create a[accent] spirit drone[] for mining and repairing blocks.

Factories for other units can be created with [accent] silicon.
Make a silicon smelter.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: Silicon requires[accent] coal[] and[accent] sand[].\nStart by making drills.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.generator: This technology requires power.\nCreate a[accent] combustion generator[] for it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: Combustion generators need fuel.\nFuel it with coal from a drill.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.node: Power requires transport.\nCreate a[accent] power node[] next to your combustion generator to transfer its power.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.nodelink: Power can be transferred through contacting power blocks and generators, or by linked power nodes.\n\nLink power by tapping the node and selecting the generator and silicon smelter.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.silicon: Silicon is being produced. Get some.\n\nImproving the production system is advised.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: Construct a[accent] dagger mech factory.[]\n\nThis will be used to create attack mechs.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.router: Factories need resources to function.\nCreate a router to split conveyor resources.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.dagger:
Link power nodes to the factory.
Once requirements are met, a mech will be created.

Create more drills, generators and conveyors as necessary.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.battle: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] has revealed their core.\nDestroy it with your unit and dagger mechs.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals blocks in its vicinity.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.duo.description: A small, cheap turret. Useful against ground units.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.arc.description: A small close-range turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coal in order to produce silicon.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes scrap into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in turrets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at full capacity.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates tiny concentrations of spores into industry-ready pods.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.

bundle_pl.properties.screenshot.invalid: Zrzut ekranu jest zbyt duży. Najprawdopodobniej brakuje miejsca w pamięci urządzenia.
bundle_pl.properties.placeline: You have selected a block.\nYou can[accent] place in a line[] by[accent] holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.\nTry it.
bundle_pl.properties.removearea: You have selected removal mode.\nYou can[accent] remove blocks in a rectangle[] by[accent] holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging.\nTry it.
bundle_pl.properties.name: Nazwa:
bundle_pl.properties.server.kicked.serverOutdated: Nieaktualny serwer! Poproś hosta o jego aktualizację.
bundle_pl.properties.server.kicked.recentKick: Zostałeś niedawno wyrzucony.\nPoczekaj chwilę przed ponownym połączniem.
bundle_pl.properties.server.kicked.nameInUse: Ta nazwa jest już zajęta na tym serwerze.
bundle_pl.properties.server.kicked.nameEmpty: Wybrana przez Ciebie nazwa jest nieprawidłowa.
bundle_pl.properties.server.kicked.idInUse: Jesteś już na serwerze! Używanie tego samego konta na 2 urządzeniach jest zabronione.
bundle_pl.properties.server.kicked.customClient: Ten serwer nie wspomaga wersji deweloperskich. Pobierz oficjalną wersję.
bundle_pl.properties.host.info:
Przycisk [accent]host[] hostuje serwer na porcie [scarlet]6567[] i [scarlet]6568.[]
Ktokolwiek z tym samym [LIGHT_GRAY]wifi lub hotspotem[] powinien zobaczyć twój serwer.

Jeśli chcesz, aby każdy z twoim IP mógł dołączyć, [accent]przekierowywanie portów[] jest potrzebne.

[LIGHT_GRAY]Notka:Jeśli ktokolwiek ma problem z dołączeniem do gry, upewnij się, że udostępniłeś Mindustry dostęp do sieci.
bundle_pl.properties.join.info:
Tutaj możesz wpisać [accent]IP serwera[], aby dołączyć lub wyszukaj [accent]serwery w lokalnej sieci[], do których chcesz dołączyć .
Gra wieloosobowa na LAN i WAN jest wspomagana.

[LIGHT_GRAY]Notka: Nie ma automatycznej listy wszystkich serwerów; jeśli chcesz dołączyć przez IP, musisz zapytać się hosta o IP.
bundle_pl.properties.host.invalid: [scarlet] Nie można połączyć się z hostem.
bundle_pl.properties.invalidid: Złe ID klienta! Udostępnij raport błędu.
bundle_pl.properties.server.delete: Czy na pewno chcesz usunąć ten serwer?
bundle_pl.properties.confirmban: Jesteś pewny, że chcesz zbanować tego gracza?
bundle_pl.properties.confirmkick: Jesteś pewny, że chcesz wyrzucić tego gracza?
bundle_pl.properties.confirmunban: Jesteś pewny, że chcesz odbanować tego gracza?
bundle_pl.properties.confirmadmin: Jesteś pewny, że chcesz dać rangę admina temu graczowi?
bundle_pl.properties.confirmunadmin: Jesteś pewny, że chcesz zabrać rangę admina temu graczowi?
bundle_pl.properties.joingame.title: Dołącz do gry
bundle_pl.properties.save.old: Ten zapis jest ze starej wersji i gra nie może go teraz wczytać.\n\n[LIGHT_GRAY]Wsparcie starych zapisów będzie w pełnej wersji 4.0.
bundle_pl.properties.save.overwrite: Czy na pewno chcesz nadpisać zapis gry?

bundle_pl.properties.save.corrupted: [accent]Zapis gry jest uszkodzony lub nieprawidłowy! Jeżeli aktualizowałeś grę, najprawdopodobniej zmiana w formacie zapisu i [scarlet]nie jest[] to błąd.
bundle_pl.properties.changelog.title: Lista Zmian
bundle_pl.properties.changelog.error.android: [accent]Notka: lista zmian czasami nie działa na Androidzie 4.4 i w dół!\nJest to spowodowane przez błąd Androida.
bundle_pl.properties.changelog.error.ios: [accent]Lista zmian nie jest wspierana przez IOS.
bundle_pl.properties.changelog.error: [scarlet]Błąd podczas pobierania listy zmian!\nSprawdź połączenie z internetem.
bundle_pl.properties.map.delete.confirm: Jesteś pewny, że chcesz usunąć tę mapę? Nie będzie można jej przywrócić.
bundle_pl.properties.map.nospawn: Ta mapa nie zawiera żadnego rdzenia! Dodaj [ROYAL]niebieski[] rdzeń do tej mapy w edytorze.
bundle_pl.properties.map.nospawn.pvp: Ta mapa nie ma żadnego rdzenia przeciwnika, aby mogli się zrespić przeciwnicy! Dodaj[SCARLET] inny niż niebieski[] rdzeń do mapy w edytorze.
bundle_pl.properties.map.nospawn.attack: Ta mapa nie ma żadnego rdzenia przeciwnika, aby można było go zaatakować! Dodaj[SCARLET] czerwony[] rdzeń do mapy w edytorze.
bundle_pl.properties.map.invalid: Błąd podczas ładowania mapy: uszkodzony lub niepoprawny plik mapy.

bundle_pl.properties.editor.save.overwrite: Ta mapa nadpisze wbudowaną mapę! Ustaw inną nazwę w 'Informacjach o mapie'.
bundle_pl.properties.editor.import.exists: [scarlet]Nie można zaimportować:[] wbudowana mapa o nazwie '{0}' już istnieje!
bundle_pl.properties.editor.unsaved: [scarlet]Masz niezapisane zmiany![]\nCzy na pewno chcesz wyjść?
bundle_pl.properties.editor.overwrite.confirm: [scarlet]Uwaga![] Mapa pod tą nazwą już istnieje. Jesteś pewny, że chcesz ją nadpisać?
bundle_pl.properties.filters.empty: [LIGHT_GRAY]Bez filtrów! Dodaj jeden za pomocą przycisku poniżej.
bundle_pl.properties.language.restart: Uruchom grę ponownie, aby ustawiony język zaczął funkcjonować.
bundle_pl.properties.abandon.text: Ta strefa i wszystkie jej surowce będą przejęte przez przeciwników.
bundle_pl.properties.launch.title: Wystrzelenie Udane
bundle_pl.properties.launch.confirm: Spowoduje to wystrzelenie wszystkich surowców w rdzeniu.\nNie będziesz mógł wrócić do tej bazy.
bundle_pl.properties.zone.requirement.complete: Fala {0} osiągnięta:\n{1} Wymagania strefy zostały spełnione.
bundle_pl.properties.error.unreachable: Serwer niedostępny.\nCzy adres jest wpisany poprawnie?
bundle_pl.properties.error.timedout: Przekroczono limit czasu!/nUpewnij się, że host ma ustawione przekierowanie portu oraz, czy adres jest poprawny!
bundle_pl.properties.error.mismatch: Błąd pakietu:\nprawdopodobne niedopasowanie klienta/serwera.\nUpewnij się, że ty i host macie najnowszą wersję Mindustry!

bundle_pl.properties.mode.survival.name: Przeżycie
bundle_pl.properties.mode.survival.description: Zwykły tryb. Limitowane surowce i fale przeciwników.
bundle_pl.properties.mode.sandbox.name: Piaskownica
bundle_pl.properties.mode.sandbox.description: Nieskończone surowce i fale bez odliczania. Dla przedszkolaków!
bundle_pl.properties.mode.pvp.name: PvP
bundle_pl.properties.mode.attack.name: Atak
bundle_pl.properties.mode.attack.description: Brak fal, celem jest zniszczenie bazy przeciwnika.
